Operation 'put-/cms/v3/source-code/{environment}/content/{path}_createOrUpdate' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description lacks clarity on what happens when a file already exists (replacement behavior) and what is returned. Added explicit side effects (create vs. replace behavior) and return value details to improve AI agent understanding of operation outcomes.

data.current_description: Upserts a file at the specified path in the specified environment. Accepts multipart/form-data content type.
data.description_suggestion: Upserts a file at the specified path in the specified environment. Accepts multipart/form-data content type. Creates a new file if none exists at the path, or replaces the existing file content. Returns the file metadata including creation/modification timestamps and asset information.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity on what happens when a file already exists (replacement behavior) and what is returned. Added explicit side effects (create vs. replace behavior) and return value details to improve AI agent understanding of operation outcomes.

message: Operation 'post-/cms/v3/source-code/{environment}/content/{path}_create' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details. Description clearly states the error condition but lacks information about the successful response. Added return value details to help AI agents understand what data is available after successful file creation.

data.current_description: Creates a file at the specified path in the specified environment. Accepts multipart/form-data content type. Throws an error if a file already exists at the specified path.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new file at the specified path in the specified environment. Accepts multipart/form-data content type. Returns an error if a file already exists at the specified path. Returns the created file metadata including asset information and timestamps.
data.reasoning: Description clearly states the error condition but lacks information about the successful response. Added return value details to help AI agents understand what data is available after successful file creation.

message: Operation 'delete-/cms/v3/source-code/{environment}/content/{path}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary uses 'Delete' but operation ID suggests 'archive' behavior - terminology inconsistency. Description lacks information about permanence of action and return value. Enhanced to clarify the destructive nature of the operation and what response is returned, critical for AI agents to understand irreversible actions.

data.current_description: Deletes the file at the specified path in the specified environment.
data.description_suggestion: Deletes the file at the specified path in the specified environment. This operation removes the file from the source code repository and cannot be undone. Returns a confirmation response indicating successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Summary uses 'Delete' but operation ID suggests 'archive' behavior - terminology inconsistency. Description lacks information about permanence of action and return value. Enhanced to clarify the destructive nature of the operation and what response is returned, critical for AI agents to understand irreversible actions.

data.current_summary: Validate the contents of a file
data.current_description: Validates the file contents passed to the endpoint given a specified path and environment. Accepts multipart/form-data content type.
data.description_suggestion: Validates file contents against the specified path and environment configuration. Accepts multipart/form-data content type. Returns validation results including any errors or warnings found. Does not modify the file if validation fails.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity on what validation rules are applied and what the response contains. Added context about validation scope, return value structure, and clarified that this is a non-destructive operation. Helps AI agents understand validation behavior and interpret results.

message: Operation 'post-/cms/v3/source-code/extract/async_doAsync' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary doesn't indicate asynchronous nature. Description lacks information about request schema (FileExtractRequest), response format (TaskLocator), HTTP status code (202), and clarification that extraction happens asynchronously. Enhanced to include schema references and status code for better AI agent understanding of async workflow and how to track progress.

data.current_description: Extract a zip file in the developer file system. Extraction status can be checked with the `/extract/async/tasks/taskId/status` endpoint below.
data.description_suggestion: Asynchronously extracts a zip file into the developer file system. Accepts a FileExtractRequest containing the zip file path. Returns a TaskLocator with a taskId (HTTP 202 Accepted) that can be used to poll extraction status via the `/extract/async/tasks/{taskId}/status` endpoint. Extraction occurs in the background.
data.reasoning: Summary doesn't indicate asynchronous nature. Description lacks information about request schema (FileExtractRequest), response format (TaskLocator), HTTP status code (202), and clarification that extraction happens asynchronously. Enhanced to include schema references and status code for better AI agent understanding of async workflow and how to track progress.
